text: Dan Mihai Roman (born 22 December 1985) is a Romanian footballer who plays as a striker for Liga III club Sănătatea Cluj.Dan Roman, transferul verii pentru Sănătatea Cluj. "Viruşii” vor avea un parteneriat cu Ardealul. cjsport.ro ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Cluj-Napoca Category:Romanian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Liga I players Category:ACF Gloria Bistrița players Category:ASA 2013 Târgu Mureș players Category:CS Gaz Metan Mediaș players Category:FC Botoșani players Category:FC Politehnica Iași (2010) players Category:CFR Cluj players Category:Liga II players Category:SCM Râmnicu Vâlcea players Category:FC UTA Arad players Category:FC Hermannstadt players
title: Dan Roman (footballer, born 1985)
